title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Web3 + AI: Agents that mean business (DAT318)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Web3 + AI：业务导向的智能代理 (DAT318)
abstract: AWS is accelerating Web3 development across diverse use cases, including AI agents entering the digital economy, through core infrastructure, specialized offerings, and partner solutions. Join AWS and Coinbase to dive deep into the fundamental building blocks and full-stack architecture where AI agents, powered by Amazon Bedrock, execute digital assets payments using open payment protocols over a public blockchain. To ensure transaction security, these agents are equipped with wallets built on AWS Nitro Enclaves. Join this session to learn how to leverage AWS and Coinbase technologies to shape the future of autonomous online payments.
abstract_cn: AWS正在通过核心基础设施、专业产品和合作伙伴解决方案，加速各种用例的Web3开发，包括AI代理进入数字经济。加入AWS和Coinbase，深入了解基础构建模块和全栈架构，其中由Amazon Bedrock驱动的AI代理通过公共区块链上的开放支付协议执行数字资产支付。为确保交易安全，这些代理配备了基于AWS Nitro Enclaves构建的钱包。参加本次会议，了解如何利用AWS和Coinbase技术塑造自主在线支付的未来。

presenter.name: Erik Reppel
presenter.title: Head of Engineering, Coinbase Developer Platform
